description.0: This famous blade was once created by the hand of the Urauksai, the renowned literati. Legend has it that it has never cut any living creature in all these hundreds of years.

0.0: While on the field, Normal and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>16%</cryo>. When not on the field, Elemental Skill DMG will be increased by <cryo>24%</cryo>. After a nearby active character deals Geo DMG, the aforementioned effects increase by 100% for 15s. Additionally, the wielder's DEF is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>.
